actions.args: {"data": {"blog": {"hackathon-resources-for-redacted-lsy0pp": {"": "We\\\\\\'re excited to have you build on NEAR and compete in the [REDACTED] hackathon.  \\\\n\\\\nAt DevHub, we are providing a list of resources to get started with NEAR technology and how to get help. \\\\n\\\\n*This is a living document and will get updated over time.*\\\\n\\\\nLive DevRel and Community Support:\\\\n- NEAR Dev Support Channels (Telegram): https://t.me/neardev\\\\n- DevHub Announcements: https://t.me/NEARDevHub\\\\n\\\\nCompletely new to NEAR: \\\\n- https://docs.near.org/concepts/basics/protocol\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/concepts/protocol/account-model\\\\n\\\\nTutorials: https://docs.near.org/tutorials/welcome\\\\n\\\\nSmart Contracts:\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/build/smart-contracts/quickstart\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/build/smart-contracts/what-is\\\\n\\\\nFrontend Development:\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/build/web3-apps/quickstart\\\\n\\\\nChain Abstraction:\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/build/chain-abstraction/chain-signatures\\\\n- https://near.org/chain-abstraction\\\\n- https://linktr.ee/chainsignatures (All about Chain Signatures)\\\\n\\\\nAI:\\\\n- https://near.ai/\\\\n\\\\nAlong with these resources we have a newsletter (https://bit.ly/devhubnews) and do a weekly live show, DevHub Live, and WuASM (Wake Up & Ship More, which does not have a set schedule yet).\\\\n\\\\nOur entire video archive, which includes all live streams and community call replays are available on our [YouTube](https://youtube.com/@NEARDevHub).\\\\n\\\\nLastly, please also make sure to check out our socials to keep up to date on everything developer centric on NEAR.\\\\n[YouTube](https://youtube.com/@NEARDevHub)\\\\n[Twitch](https://twitch.tv/neardevhub)\\\\n[X](https://x.com/neardevhub)\\\\n[IG](https://instagram.com/neardevhub)\\\\n[TikTok](https://tiktok.com/@neardevhub)\\\\n[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/near-devhub)\\\\n[Threads](https://www.threads.net/@neardevhub)\\\\n[Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/user/NEARDevHub)\\\\n", "metadata": {"title": "Hackathon Resources for REDACTED", "author": "orangejoe.near", "status": "PUBLISH", "category": "reference", "subtitle": "Quick links to get started with your project", "updatedAt": "2024-08-19", "description": "Quick links to help get started with your hackathon project.", "publishedAt": "2024-08-09"}}}}, "handle": "developer-dao"}

{"data": {"developer-dao.community.devhub.near": {"blog": {"hackathon-resources-for-redacted-lsy0pp": {"": "We\\\\\\'re excited to have you build on NEAR and compete in the [REDACTED] hackathon. DevRel and Community Support:\\\\n- NEAR Dev Support Channels (Telegram): https://t.me/neardev\\\\n- DevHub Announcements: https://t.me/NEARDevHub\\\\n\\\\nCompletely new to NEAR: \\\\n- https://docs.near.org/concepts/basics/protocol\\\\n- https://docs.near.org/concepts/protocol/account-model\\\\n\\\\nTutorials: https://docs.near.org/tutorials/welcome\\\\n\\\\nSmart Contracts:\\\\n- https://linktr.ee/chainsignatures (All about Chain Signatures)\\\\n\\\\nAI:\\\\n- https://near.ai/\\\\n\\\\nAlong with these resources we have a newsletter (https://bit.ly/devhubnews) and do a weekly {"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by THOMAS for 07/22/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}08/09/2024", "summary": "Worked on Devhub\\\\\\'s code debt. Mostly the events committee portal part. Fixed small bugs and reviewed PR\\\\\\'s.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "## Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n\\\\nWeek 1: July 22 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}July 26\\\\n\\\\nJuly 23 - 4 hours\\\\n- Merged [887](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/887)\\\\n- Continued [891](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/891)\\\\n- 2 hour call with Megha\\\\n\\\\nJuly 24 - 4 hours\\\\n- Created issue [903](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/903)\\\\n- Continue [848](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/848)\\\\n- Stand up\\\\n- Synced [Indexer](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-proposals-indexer/commit/07babcafd4701bc3856220a55122ebd6f9e2861f)\\\\n\\\\nJuly 25 - 1 hour\\\\n- Review [905](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/905)\\\\n- Merged [891](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/891)\\\\n- Merged [886](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/886)\\\\n- Merged [899](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/905)\\\\n- Standardise links\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 9 hours\\\\n\\\\nWeek 2: August 5  \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}August 9\\\\n\\\\nAugust 7 - 4 hours\\\\n- PostHog init in web4\\\\n- PR [915](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/915) and fix issues with tests\\\\n- Work on changes to none trivial (similar) duplicate files [916](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/916)\\\\n- Standup\\\\n\\\\nAugust 8 - 1 hour\\\\n- Reviewed [37](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/37)\\\\n- Merged [915](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/915)\\\\n- Looking into the blog bug\\\\n\\\\nTotal hours: 5 hours\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n## Cost\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 14 hours\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour ~ \\\\u{20ac}90/h is an average rate for a medior freelance front end web3 developer in the Netherlands ranging from 35 (absolute beginner) to 150 (senior) [for example](https://zzpservicedesk.nl/uurtarief-freelance-developer/)\\\\n- Total amount: $1400 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "thomasguntenaar.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1400", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 126144708}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @thomasguntenaar.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by THOMAS for 07/22/2024 \\\\u{2013}\\\\u{a0}08/09/2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWorked on Devhub\\\\\\'s code debt. Mostly the events committee portal part. Fixed small bugs and reviewed PR\\\\\\'s.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=184)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"addons": [{"id": "announcements", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "announcements", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Announcements"}, {"id": "discussions", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "discussions", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Discussions"}, {"id": "activity", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "activity", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Activity"}, {"id": "57gi1y", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Developer Newsletters \\\\u{1f4f0}"}, {"id": "sjhpwx", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR Dev NEWS is our developer newsletter dedicated to sharing insights, updates, and resources within the NEAR Protocol developer community. There are numerous ways you can contribute to NEAR Dev NEWS and help shape weekly updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. **Articles and Tutorials**: Share your expertise and knowledge by writing articles and tutorials related to NEAR Protocol\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n2. **Project Showcases**: Showcase your projects and applications built on NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n3. **Event Announcements and Reports**: Keep the community informed about upcoming NEAR-related events, workshops, hackathons, and conferences. Additionally, share your experiences and key takeaways from events you\\\\\\'ve attended.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n4. **Feedback and Suggestions**: Share your thoughts on the newsletter\\\\\\'s content, format, and topics. Additionally, suggest ideas for future editions, highlight areas for improvement, and provide constructive criticism to help us better serve the community.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n5. **Sharing and Promotion**: Spread the word about NEAR Dev NEWS within your networks and communities. Share articles, tutorials, and updates on social media platforms, developer forums, and blockchain-related communities.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n- Submit all relevant links via our \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Discussions page\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" and get featured! \\\\\\\\n **Be sure to include a brief bio and any resources.**\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n- Sign up for the weekly newsletter [here](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/)\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to get featured \\\\u{2728}"}, {"id": "rnu380", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Subscribe"}], "handle": "neardevnews"}
